data.message:
I were so happy when i would get a photo Or an autograph with/from you ! It would mean to much for me and i would be so happy. I woke up all the childhood time with your Music ‼️
You & your music has helped me so much because i was allways an Outsider and was bullied anytime.  
Iam from Germany an 19 years. And i have so many stuff/items about you. Maybe oneday u comes again To Germany.
You allways welcome ❤️ 
Hopefully you would reed this Text 👌🏻 and nasaan is also great
